missions.title: Welcome to The Case of The Missing Sqeakers

content.text:
A lighthearted spy-thriller where the dog is the star agent and the owner is their trusted handler. 
Objective: To find the hidden stash of stolen squeakers and foil the plans of the notorious (and fluffy) villain, Baron von Squirrely.

appearance.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif
